headline: Intel (INTC) Is Up 5.5% After Launching 18A-Based Core Ultra 3 AI Platform – Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: At CES 2026, Intel unveiled its Core Ultra Series 3 processors, the first AI PC and edge platform built on the new US-manufactured Intel 18A process and set to power more than 200 PC designs as well as certified embedded and industrial systems. By combining integrated AI acceleration and Arc graphics into a single system-on-chip that can also serve robotics, smart cities, and other edge workloads, the launch ties Intel’s PC roadmap directly to its ambitions in advanced manufacturing and...

headline: Infortrend Unveils Its Most Advanced U.2 NVMe SSD Storage Solution Designed to Propel the AI Era
summary: Infortrend Technology, Inc. (TWSE: 2495), a leading provider of enterprise storage and AI solutions, today announced the launch of EonStor GS 5024U, its highest-performing storage system to date. It delivers exceptional performance, reliability, and scalability, effectively meeting the growing demands of AI workloads—from model training and inference to real-time analytics.

headline: Supermicro Brings Enterprise-Class AI Performance to the Client, Edge, and Consumer Markets
summary: Super Micro Computer, Inc. (SMCI), a Total IT Solution Provider for AI/ML, HPC, Cloud, Storage, and 5G/Edge, will showcase its latest high-performance Super AI Station in Las Vegas, Nevada. Designed for AI developers, start-ups, and higher education and research professionals, Supermicro's new portfolio of products brings the latest innovation and performance to the desktop, edge, and consumer markets.
